mapper.insert: insert into ESERVICE.DBO.TRANS(TRANS_NUM, TRANS_DATE, TRANS_TYPE, USER_ID, STATUS, CREATE_USER, CREATE_DATE) values( #{vo.transNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, getdate(), #{vo.transType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vo.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vo.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vo.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, getdate() )
mapper.select: SELECT TP.POLICY_NO AS POLICYNO, B.PRODUCT_NAME AS PRODUCTNAME FROM ESERVICE.DBO.TRANS_POLICY TP JOIN ESERVICE.DBO.POLICY P ON TP.POLICY_NO = P.POLICY_NO JOIN ESERVICE.DBO.PRODUCT B ON P.POLICY_TYPE = B.PRODUCT_CODE AND (SELECT LIPM_INSU_BEG_DATE FROM ESERVICE.DBO.LILIPM WHERE LIPM_INSU_NO = P.POLICY_NO) BETWEEN B.DESI_SALE_DATE AND B.DESI_CHAN_VAR_DATE WHERE TP.TRANS_NUM = #{transNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE TRANS SET STATUS = #{status} WHERE TRANS_NUM = #{transNum}
UPDATE ESERVICE.DBO.INSURANCE_CLAIM SET STATUS = #{status} WHERE TRANS_NUM = #{transNum} and CASE_ID is null
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ESERVICE.DBO.TRANS_FILE (ID, TRANS_NUM, FILE_NAME, FILE_DATA, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER) VALUES ( (NEXT VALUE FOR DBO.TRANS_FILE_ID_SEQ), #{transNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transFile,jdbcType=BLOB}, getdate(), #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select user_id from ESERVICE.DBO.TRANS where trans_num=#{transNum} and status='2' and trans_type=#{transType}

select count(*) from eservice.dbo.TRANS A left join eservice.dbo.TRANS_INSURANCE_CLAIM B on a.TRANS_NUM = B.TRANS_NUM where A.STATUS not in ('2','3','7','8') and A.TRANS_TYPE = 'INSURANCE_CLAIM' and B.ID_NO = ESERVICE.dbo.FN_ENBASE64(#{rocId})

select count(*) from eservice.dbo.TRANS A left join eservice.dbo.TRANS_MEDICAL_TREATMENT_CLAIM B on a.TRANS_NUM = B.TRANS_NUM where A.STATUS not in ('2','3','7','8') and A.TRANS_TYPE = 'MEDICAL_TREATMENT' and B.ID_NO = ESERVICE.dbo.FN_ENBASE64(#{rocId})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ESERVICE.DBO.TRANS_STATUS_HISTORY (TS_ID,TRANS_NUM,CUSTOMERNAME,USER_IDENTITY,STATUS,REJECT_REASON,CONTENT) VALUES ( (NEXT VALUE FOR ESERVICE.DBO.TRANS_STATUS_HISTORY_SEQ), #{vo.transNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vo.customerName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vo.identity, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vo.status, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vo.rejectReason, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vo.content, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select FLOOR(DATEDIFF(DY,LIPI_BIRTH,GETDATE())/365.25) as age,LIPI_BIRTH from ESERVICE.dbo.LILIPI where LIPI_INSU_NO = #{policyNo}
select CONVERT(varchar(10), CREATE_DATE, 120) AS CREATE_DATE from ESERVICE.DBO.TRANS where trans_num=#{transNum}

SELECT count(*) FROM ESERVICE.DBO.TRANS_CONTACT_INFO_DTL A JOIN ESERVICE.DBO.TRANS_CONTACT_INFO B on A.TRANS_CONTACT_ID = B.ID JOIN ESERVICE.DBO.TRANS_POLICY C on B.TRANS_NUM = C.TRANS_NUM JOIN ESERVICE.DBO.LILIPM D ON C.POLICY_NO = D.LIPM_INSU_NO JOIN ESERVICE.DBO.TRANS E ON C.TRANS_NUM = E.TRANS_NUM WHERE E.STATUS not in ('2','3','6','7') AND E.TRANS_TYPE = 'CONTACT_INFO' AND D.LIPM_ID = #{rocId}
